data.title: Allparts Music Corporation Acquired by Ambina Partners
data.meta_description: HOUSTON, TX and GREENWICH, CT – January 30, 2018 Ambina Partners announced today it has acquired Allparts Music Corporation, the industry’s premier source for guitar and bass parts. This is the first of several planned acquisitions in the music industry as the firm establishes a footprint in the space.   Commented Greg Share, Chairman of […]
data.text:
Ambina Partners announced today it has acquired Allparts Music Corporation, the industry’s premier source for guitar and bass parts. This is the first of several planned acquisitions in the music industry as the firm establishes a footprint in the space.

Commented Greg Share, Chairman of Ambina Partners, "Allparts is a well-known brand that has a long-established place in the music industry and we are pleased to add this acquisition to our portfolio."

Allparts will continue to operate from its headquarters and distribution facility located in Houston, TX as it serves US, Canadian and international distributors, guitar retailers and consumer customers.
